trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关数据<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName> event enables you to customize (or owner-draw) the appearance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control in the details view.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName>事件可用于自定义 （或所有者描述） 的外观对<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>详细信息视图中的控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised by a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control when its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to `true` and its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName>事件由引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性设置为`true`和其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs passed to the event handler contains information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw and also provides methods to help you draw the subitem.
trans-unit.target: 传递给事件处理程序 DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs 信息包含有关<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>绘制还提供了方法，以帮助你绘制子项。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ItemState%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Item%2A> properties to retrieve information about the parent item of the subitem to draw.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ItemState%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Item%2A>属性，以检索有关要绘制的子项的父项的信息。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Item%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ItemState%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> itself, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.SubItem%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要检索<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>本身，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.SubItem%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.SubItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Header%2A> property to retrieve the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> representing the header of the column in which the subitem is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Header%2A>属性，以检索<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>表示在其中显示子项的列的标头。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Header%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Graphics%2A> property to do the actual drawing within the area specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Graphics%2A>属性以执行指定的区域中，实际的绘图<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Graphics%2A>

trans-unit.source: To draw standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> elements that do not need customization, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawFocusRectangle%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要绘制标准<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>元素不需要自定义项，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawFocusRectangle%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawFocusRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawDefault%2A> property when you want the operating system to draw the subitem.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawDefault%2A>当你想要绘制子项的操作系统时，属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawDefault%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you want to customize only specific subitems.
trans-unit.target: 当你想要自定义仅特定子项时，这非常有用。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To avoid issues with graphics flickering when owner drawing, override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DoubleBuffered%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 以避免出现问题时所有者描述，重写出现图形闪烁<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件并设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DoubleBuffered%2A>属性`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DoubleBuffered%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: This feature is available only on Windows XP and the Windows Server 2003 family when your application calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 当你的应用程序调用时，此功能才可用仅在 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 系列上<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets the size and location of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 获取的大小和位置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>绘制。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: The location specified by this property is relative to the upper-left corner of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定的位置是相对于窗口左上角<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounds of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>表示的边界<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>绘制。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> column in which the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 获取的索引<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref>列顺序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>显示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> column within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: 索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>中的列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A?displayProperty=fullName>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Draws the background of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> using its current background color.
trans-unit.target: 绘制背景的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>使用其当前的背景色。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Use this method to draw a standard background that uses the current value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法来绘制使用的当前值标准背景<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The background is drawn to fill the area specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 绘制背景来填充指定的区域<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> must be set to `false` to prevent the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value of the parent item from overriding the subitem value.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A>的父属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>必须设置为`false`以防止<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>重写子项值的父项的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> should be drawn by the operating system instead of owner-drawn.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>应由操作系统而不是所有者描述绘制。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Use this property when handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName> event for subitems that you do not want to customize.
trans-unit.target: 处理时使用此属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName>不想要自定义的子项的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you set this property to `true`, the subitem will be drawn normally using the current values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> must be set to `false` to prevent the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value of the parent item from overriding the subitem value.
trans-unit.target: 如果将此属性设置为`true`，通常使用的当前值绘制子项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性&1;> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A>的父属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>必须设置为`false`以防止<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>重写子项值的父项的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the subitem should be drawn by the operating system; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果应由操作系统; 绘制子项否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Draws a focus rectangle for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> if the parent <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> has focus.
trans-unit.target: 绘制聚焦框<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>如果父<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref>具有焦点。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Use this method to draw a standard focus rectangle around the subitem.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于标准周围绘制聚焦框子项。

trans-unit.source: The focus rectangle is drawn one pixel inside the area specified by the `bounds` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 焦点矩形位于指定的区域内绘制一个像素`bounds`参数。

trans-unit.source: It is drawn only when the parent item has focus, so you do not need to check the focus state of the item before you call this method.
trans-unit.target: 仅当父项具有焦点，因此不需要检查项的焦点状态，然后才能调用此方法时对其是绘制。

trans-unit.source: You might want to draw the focus rectangle only around the first subitem (that is, the parent item, which is displayed in the first column) rather than drawing it around every subitem of an item.
trans-unit.target: 你可能想要周围绘制聚焦框仅第一个子项 （即，父项，显示在第一列） 而不是在每个子项周围绘制它。

trans-unit.source: This corresponds to the normal behavior of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FullRowSelect%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 这对应于的正常行为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FullRowSelect%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性设置为`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FullRowSelect%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: To draw the focus rectangle around the first subitem, call the DrawFocusRectangle method only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A> value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 若要绘制聚焦框的第一个子项，调用 DrawFocusRectangle 方法时，才<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>值为 0。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control does not provide the ability to select individual subitems, but if you want to implement subitem selection yourself, you can use this method to draw the focus rectangle around a subitem other than the first one.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件不提供能够选择各个子项，但如果你想要自己实现子项选择，可以使用此方法来周围绘制聚焦框以外的第一个子项。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The area within which to draw the focus rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 在其中绘制聚焦框区域。

trans-unit.source: Draws the text of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> using its current foreground color.
trans-unit.target: 绘制的文本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>使用当前前景色。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Use this method to draw the subitem text using the current values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法使用的当前值的子项文本绘制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The text is drawn within the area specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的区域内绘制文本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> must be set to `false` to prevent the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> values of the parent item from overriding the subitem values.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A>的父属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>必须设置为`false`以防止<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName>重写的子项值的父项的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Draws the text of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> using its current foreground color and formatting it with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 绘制的文本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>使用当前前景色和格式化它使用指定<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"></xref>值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Use this method to draw the subitem text using the current values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法使用的当前值的子项文本绘制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The text is drawn within the area specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的区域内绘制文本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> values specified in the `flags` parameter let you provide formatting properties for the node label, such as text alignment.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>中指定的值`flags`参数让你提供格式设置属性，节点标签，如文本对齐方式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> must be set to `false` to prevent the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> values of the parent item from overriding the subitem values.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A>的父属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>必须设置为`false`以防止<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName>重写的子项值的父项的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 按位组合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>用于绘制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class provides properties and methods useful for drawing on the display device.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>类提供属性和显示设备上绘制的有用的方法。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>用于绘制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Gets the header of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> column in which the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 获取的标头<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref>列顺序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>显示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref> for the column in which the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> is displayed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"> </xref>在其中的列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>显示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 获取父<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>绘制。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Use this property to access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> parent of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于访问<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>的父级<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>绘制。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ItemState%2A> property does not provide adequate information to meet your needs.
trans-unit.target: 这非常有用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ItemState%2A>属性未提供足够信息以满足你的需求。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ItemState%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ItemState%2A> property provides only basic state information that you can use, for example, to determine whether the parent item is selected, checked, or focused.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ItemState%2A>属性提供了你可以使用，例如，若要确定是选择、 选中，还是已设定焦点的父项的基本状态信息。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ItemState%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Item property, on the other hand, allows you to access all members of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>.
trans-unit.target: Item 属性中，另一方面，允许您访问父<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>的所有成员

trans-unit.source: To access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> being drawn, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.SubItem%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 访问<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>正在绘制，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.SubItem%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.SubItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> that represents the parent of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref>表示的父<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>绘制。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the parent <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 获取父索引<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>绘制。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: The index of the parent <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: 父级的索引<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref>内<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A?displayProperty=fullName>集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current state of the parent <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 获取父的当前状态<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>绘制。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Use this property to check whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> parent of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw is in a particular state.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性检查是否<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>的父级<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>绘制处于特定状态。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: This property provides only basic state information about the parent item.
trans-unit.target: 此属性提供有关父项的基本状态信息。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property, for example, to determine whether the parent item is selected, checked, or focused.
trans-unit.target: 此属性，例如，可用于确定是选择、 选中，还是已设定焦点的父项。

trans-unit.source: If you need to know more, retrieve the parent item through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Item%2A> property and check its properties directly.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要知道的详细信息，检索通过父项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Item%2A>属性并直接检查其属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates"></xref> values indicating the current state of the parent <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 按位组合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates"></xref>值，该值指示当前状态的父<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>绘制。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: This method is useful when the other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs> properties do not provide adequate information to meet your needs.
trans-unit.target: 当此方法很有用的其他<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs>属性不会提供足够信息以满足你的需求。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The SubItem property allows you to access all members of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> being drawn.
trans-unit.target: 子项属性允许你访问的所有成员<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>进行绘制。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: You must access this object directly, for example, to draw the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value yourself rather than using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你必须直接访问此对象，例如，若要绘制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>值自己一点，而不是使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>绘制。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>
